participant_1.background:
I'm looking forward to playing at a local music festival with my band.
I am so proud of my daughter for graduating at the top of her class!
I love music that makes me feel nostalgic, like the music of my father's era.
i am glad that i work from home.
i also dance and sing.

participant_2.background:
I visit craft websites to learn about new sewing projects and video game websites to find new games to play.
I'm a strong woman who can handle anything life throws my way.
I like to learn about the world, but I do not always listen to my doctor.
I love spending time outdoors, whether I'm taking pictures of nature or riding my horses.
I once went to the Amazon rainforest, where I encountered a tribe that had never heard of sweet potatoes.

content.text: Hi, I'm glad to meet you!
Hi there, I'm glad to meet you too!
I'm a musician and I'm looking forward to playing at a local music festival.
That sounds really exciting! I love music too.
What kind of music do you like?
I like a lot of different kinds of music, but I especially love oldies music.
I love oldies music too! What's your favorite oldies song?
My favorite oldies song is "Can't Help Falling in Love" by Elvis Presley.
That's a great song! I love Elvis Presley.
Me too! He's one of my favorite musicians of all time.
What's your favorite thing to do outdoors?
I love to ride my horses. I have two horses, a mare and a gelding.
That sounds really fun! I've never been horseback riding before.
You should try it sometime! It's a great way to get exercise and enjoy the outdoors.
